ðŸ“– Summary: Ratatui is a Rust crate that provides a flexible and simple way to build terminal user interfaces (TUIs). It offers a collection of widgets and layout components to create interactive console applications, dashboards, and other terminal-based programs. Ratatui also provides templates to help developers quickly get started with new projects.
